Class AbstractBoard

java.lang.Object
AbstractBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
BoardArray1D, BoardArray2D
public abstract class AbstractBoard
extends java.lang.Object
This is an Abstract super Class Abstract methods are end of the class.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
      Two boards are equal, if the boards are the same. This operator does not consider last move or the number of steps.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object

    • cell

      public abstract int cell​(int index1, int index2)
      This method will be used in global method. Takes two indexes and returns the corresponding cell content. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.

    • cell

      protected abstract void cell​(int index1, int index2, int newValue)
      Takes two indexes and a new value. Change corresponding cell content with new value. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.

    • setSize

      public abstract void setSize​(int r, int c, int s)
      This method will be different for derived class so it's abstract Sets the board size to given values. The values are given as parameters and there are no restrictions on the board size. The board is reset after this operation.
